title: Ativan logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090522111657im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ativan_6110.gif)

Can’t quite pin this one. Anybody? That lower-case ’a’ brings Kabel to mind, but the upper-case ’A’ isn’t consistent with that.
author: topdownjimmy

comments.content:
I think this is a custom logo. The slope of the t crossbar, and the top of the ’a’ are meant to fit the slope of the adjacent letters. It may be modified from an existing font, or it may be custom drawn.

- Mike Yanega
